typeuses.angryguards.guardcrossbowday: Not only angry but also well armed
typeuses.angryguards.guardcrossbownight: Not only angry but also well armed

angryguards.research.angryguardbow.name: Angry Bow Guard
angryguards.research.angryguardbow.description: Unlocks angry guards with bows. They shoot players, not zombies.

angryguards.research.angryguardcrossbow.name: Angry Crossbow Guard
angryguards.research.angryguardcrossbow.description: Unlocks angry guards with crossbows. When you really want to get them.

angryguards.research.angryguardmatchlock.name: Angry Matchlock Gun Guard
angryguards.research.angryguardmatchlock.description: Unlocks angry guards with matchlock guns. For a really rainy day - for them, not you.
